data.text:
@_lourenco_c @_lourenco_c Olá Lourenço, lamentamos os transtornos experienciados. Caso ainda possamos ser úteis com a sua questão, pedimos que nos informe e faculte um printscreen por mensagem direta. 
Obrigado.

data.text: @HorsmanLesley Hello Lesley, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@MartinVacher2 @martinvacher2 Hello Martin, we replied by direct message. 
Thank you.

@zlatan7__ Hello,
We answered per DM.
@Mirav_V Hello Mirav, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@njg_03 @njg_03 Hello Nicholas, we replied by direct message. Thank you.

@antonioppj Olá Antonio,
A sua mensagem privada será respondida o mais rapidamente possível. Agradecemos a compreensão.

@angelarutledge angelarutledge,
our apologies for our last message, we verify that you have already provided the file number. 
We will verify the situation and get back to you as soon as possible. 
Thank you.

@phand00 Hello P.H.,
That complaint concerns to a ticket that does not belong to TAP and neither to none of our partner airlines.

@HeuraVidal Hola Heura,
Sigue bajo análisis y recibirá una respuesta lo antes posible. Gracias por su comprensión.

@ChenchoTroyan Hola Chencho,
Le pedimos que nos encamine el código por mensaje privado. Gracias

@rpbaltazar Hello Rui,
We present our most sincere apologies for the situation you are experiencing. We are available though this channel in case you need any assistance. Thank you

@jzg1967 Hello Jz,
We are glad to know (through private messages) that the third bag has already been delivered. Please let us know if you need any further assistance. Thank you

@iurifarenzena Olá Iuri,
Como podemos ajudar por esta via? Obrigada

@Misousa2020 Maria,
Como indicado, a sua reclamação está em análise, pelo que solicitamos que aguarde a sua resolução. Obrigada

@EBluemountain1 Hello ElBluemountain, we truly apologise for the inconvenient caused. However, we don't have any earlier option tomorrow. If you need any further assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@Misousa2020 Olá,
Agradecemos o contacto e informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem. Obrigada

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so we can resolve it, or check on the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@GothicLolly Hello Pollyanna, 
We apologize for any inconvenience you might have experienced while traveling with TAP. You can forward your request directly on our website, through this link: https://t.co/2kBAKBoiPb  
Feel free to contact back if further assistance is needed.
Thank you.

@augustohidalgob Hello Augusto,
if you still need our assistance, please provide us the booking reference via DM. Thank you.

@laurinhadr Olá Lau,
Lamentamos a questão que nos reporta por esta via. Caso possamos prestar assistência, pedimos que nos indique como podemos ajudar. Obrigada
@EmilseMancilla Hola Emilse, lamentamos la situación. Sus mensajes privados en Facebook han sido contestados. Gracias.

data.text: @noebomm Envíenos un mensaje directo para que podamos indicarle el número de TP solicitado. Gracias.

@AntiMarketingTO You are welcome. If further information is needed or if you wish that we double-check it, send us a DM with your booking code to verify, for confidentiality reasons. We thank you in advance.

data.text:
@laurenpreston13 Hello Lauren,
We will reply to your DM promptly.
@Johnycastro_ Olá Johny, respondemos à sua mensagem direta. Obrigado.
@fernandapaulaf Olá Fernanda, lamentamos qualquer constrangimento na navegação e recurso ao site/app. Estamos ao dispor por mensagem direta, caso necessite da nossa assistência.

@LaJeuneDame @RosebellK Hello,
We inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you

@lucimara_ulrich Olá Lucimara, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.
@noebomm Hola Noebomm, ¿todavía podemos ayudar por acá? Envíenos un mensaje con su correo electrónico y su cuestión. Estamos disponibles.

@Fernand99953060 Bonjour Carole,
nous vous informons que votre procès est en cours de vérification et vous serez contacté par e-mail dans les plus brefs délais.
Nous vous remercions de votre compréhension et nous restons à votre disposition pour toute information complémentaire.
Bonne journée!

@sjbarnard30 Sarah, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. We inform you that this situation is being verified. We will contact you as soon as we obtain any new information on this matter.
Thank you
@laisribeiross Por motivos de confidencialidade de dados, sugerimos que envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado. 2/2

@laisribeiross Olá Lais, lamentamos a situação que nos reporta e pedimos desculpa pelos transtornos causados. Pedimos que nos indique o número da sua reclamação e o seu endereço de email, por favor. 1/2
@Wasim571 Hello Wasim, we apologize for not replying sooner. Please let us know if we can still assist you through this channel, via DM. We are available.

@emily_s_baker Hello Emily,
our apologies for the waiting.
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.
@PatoBke Hola Pato, su DM ha sido contestado. Gracias.
@SpainForSure A mensagem enviada não clarifica o motivo do seu contacto, por isso voltámos a perguntar. Obrigado.
@Sally23555314 Hello Sally, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@Sally23555314 Hello Sally, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@heliasofia Olá, respondemos à sua mensagem direta. Obrigado.
@Carladpr Bonjour Carla, une réponse vous a été apportée en message. Merci.

@RubenRCarlos Olá Ruben, informamos que, no aeroporto de Marraquexe, mesmo que efetue o check-in online, o cartão de embarque deve ser recolhido no aeroporto, não estando disponível para ser imprimido através do nosso site. Disponha se necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado.
@Gracieladsilv Hola G, su DM ha sido contestado. 💬 Gracias.
@morgs__87 Hello Morgan, we have replied to your DM. We apologize for the delay. Thank you.

Nice is the destination you need to add to your fall/winter bucket list! 🍁🇫🇷
Book your trip at the best price at https://t.co/TSOOyICbOJ. Don't forget that in every fare we offer the free transportation of a 🧳 and a 🎒 in the cabin. https://t.co/J8qsn9wcF2

urls.title: The best of the French Riviera awaits you

data.text:
Nice é o destino que precisam de adicionar à vossa bucket list de outono/inverno! 🍁🇫🇷
Reservem já a vossa viagem ao melhor preço em https://t.co/TSOOyICbOJ. Não se esqueçam que em todas as tarifas oferecemos o transporte gratuito de uma 🧳 e de um 🎒 na cabine. https://t.co/us9aCYVCqh
@SpainForSure Olá Begoña, envie-nos a sua questão por mensagem direta, por favor, caso necessite de alguma assistência por esta via. Estamos ao dispor.

@AntiMarketingTO Hello Brett, the use of a mask is no longer mandatory on board all TAP flights. However, passengers must inform themselves about specific rules that may exist at points of origin and destination, such as, for example, the mandatory use of a mask at airports. Thank you.

@yanan920523 Hello Yanan, we have replied by DM. 
Thank you.
@Curiel__ Hello Gustavo, we have replied to your direct messages. Thank you.
@Curiel__ Hello Gustavo, we have replied to your direct messages. Thank you.

@hannahmc38 We are truly sorry for the situation and inconvenience caused, but we assure you all efforts are being made so you can recover your luggage as briefly as possible.
Thank you.

@hannahmc38 @Sue_Clark1 Hello Hannah,
you have registered the situation and received a missing luggage report number (PIR), is that correct? Having registered the situation, as soon as there is any update, you will be notified through the contact information associated to the file.
@angelarutledge For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you. (2/2)

@KrayNath Bonjour Nathalie,
tout d'abord, veuillez accepter nos plus sincères excuses pour l'attente. 
Nous vérifierons la situation et vous serez contacté par e-mail dans les plus brefs délais. 
Nous vous remercions pour votre compréhension et patience. 
Bonne journée.
@Kaiserperico Le agradecemos su comprensión y quedamos a su disposición para cualquier otra consulta. Un saludo. (2/2)

@ValVannet Hello Val,
we're sorry to hear this was your experience with us. 
In order to verify the situation, please provide us with the lost baggage file number (PIR). For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message.
Thank you.

data.text: @AmaAdom14169587 Hello Ama, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@IsabelleFeliu Hello Isabelle, thank you for the feedback. We are glad to know you have received one of the two missing bags. In case we can be of further assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@CJMcHarris Hello Catherine,
We have already answered your private messages. Thank you
@iceball_23 Thank you, we have replied to it.

@HorsmanLesley Hello Lesley, we verify that your claim is under analysis by the Customer Service department. They will give you a response by email, as briefly as possible.
In the meantime, if further assistance is needed, please let us know.

@BlancaPlanet Hola Blanca,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar antes. Reiteramos las informaciones ya antes enviadas y le rogamos una vez más que aguarde la resolución de su proceso. Gracias
@dmadrizl @el_yisus21 @esolidar Dayana, for confidentiality reasons, we replied by private message. Thank you.

@Ns_944 Hello,
We have replied to your private messages. Thank you
@dmadrizl @el_yisus21 @esolidar Hello Dayana, we replied by private message. Thank you.

@KayJTweet Hello KJAYL,
in order to verify, please provide us the e-ticket number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.

@AimiMcNeill @ManchesterAirp @UK_CAA @OurmieresChris Aimi,
We reiterate the already provided information. Your case is under analysis and you will have to wait for our contact. Nevertheless, we apologize for all the inconvenience caused. Thank you

data.text:
@Jasdeep47297566 Hello Jasdeep,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. We inform you that we have already checked and answered your private messages. Thank you
@LeftOutLucie For security reasons, we kindly request that you send the details through a private message. Thank you (3/3)

@LeftOutLucie In order for us to be able to verify the situation, we kindly request that you please provide us with the PIR number (the code you received at the airport when reported the missing luggage, upon arrival). (2/3)

@LeftOutLucie Hello Marybeth,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/3)

@bbyceee Hello Carmen,
in order to verify, please provide us the process file number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@vinholland Olá, assim que tenhamos uma resposta, retomaremos o contacto. Garantimos que o seu processo não está esquecido. Obrigado.

@paufontrubio Hello Pau,
please provide us the claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@Maxie_17 Hello Maxie,
We have already answered to your private message. Thank you

@iiingridcosta @reversemilla Olá Ingrid,
Informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada

@Omaralabed04 @esolidar Hello Omar,
We have already replied to your private messages. Thank you
@iceball_23 For security reasons and data protection, we advise you to send the details through a private message. Thank you (3/3)
